mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL(mem_id, trv_tt, trv_pc, trv_x, trv_y, trv_sdt, trv_edt, trv_ct, trv_op) VALUES (#{memId}, #{trvTt}, #{trvPc}, #{trvX}, #{trvY}, #{trvSdt}, #{trvEdt}, #{trvCt}, #{trvOp})
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAVEL SET mem_id = #{memId}, trv_tt = #{trvTt}, trv_pc = #{trvPc}, trv_x = #{trvX}, trv_y = #{trvY}, trv_sdt = #{trvSdt}, trv_edt = #{trvEdt}, trv_ct = #{trvCt}, trv_op = #{trvOp} WHERE trv_id = #{trvId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.trv_id, t.trv_tt, t.trv_pc, t.trv_x, t.trv_y, TO_CHAR(t.trv_sdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_sdt, TO_CHAR(t.trv_edt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(t.trv_ct, 4000, 1) AS trv_ct, t.trv_op, MAX(CASE WHEN i.trv_idx = '1' THEN i.trv_img END) AS trv_img1, MAX(CASE WHEN i.trv_idx = '2' THEN i.trv_img END) AS trv_img2, MAX(CASE WHEN i.trv_idx = '3' THEN i.trv_img END) AS trv_img3 FROM travel t LEFT JOIN images i ON t.trv_id = i.trv_id WHERE t.trv_id = #{trvId} GROUP BY t.trv_id, t.trv_tt, t.trv_pc, t.trv_x, t.trv_y, t.trv_sdt, t.trv_edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(t.trv_ct, 4000, 1), t.trv_op

WITH couple_members AS ( SELECT m1.mem_id, m1.cop_id FROM MEMBER m1 WHERE m1.mem_id = #{memId} UNION SELECT m2.mem_id, m2.cop_id FROM MEMBER m1 JOIN MEMBER m2 ON m1.cop_id = m2.cop_id WHERE m1.mem_id = #{memId} AND m1.cop_id IS NOT NULL ) SELECT a.trv_id, a.mem_id, a.trv_tt, a.trv_pc, SUBSTR(a.trv_pc, 0, 2) trv_plc, TO_CHAR(a.trv_sdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_sdt, TO_CHAR(a.trv_edt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(a.trv_Ct, 4000, 1) AS trv_ct, a.trv_op, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 1 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img1, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 2 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img2, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 3 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img3 FROM travel a LEFT JOIN images b ON a.trv_id = b.trv_id JOIN couple_members cm ON a.mem_id = cm.mem_id GROUP BY a.trv_id, a.mem_id, a.trv_Tt, a.trv_Pc, a.trv_Sdt, a.trv_Edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(a.trv_Ct, 4000, 1), a.trv_Op ORDER BY a.trv_sdt DESC

SELECT * FROM (WITH couple_members AS ( SELECT m1.mem_id, m1.cop_id FROM MEMBER m1 WHERE m1.mem_id = #{memId} UNION SELECT m2.mem_id, m2.cop_id FROM MEMBER m1 JOIN MEMBER m2 ON m1.cop_id = m2.cop_id WHERE m1.mem_id = #{memId} AND m1.cop_id IS NOT NULL ) SELECT a.trv_id, a.mem_id, a.trv_tt, a.trv_pc, SUBSTR(a.trv_pc, 0, 2) trv_plc, TO_CHAR(a.trv_sdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_sdt, TO_CHAR(a.trv_edt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') trv_edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(a.trv_Ct, 4000, 1) AS trv_ct, a.trv_op, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 1 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img1, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 2 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img2, MAX(CASE WHEN b.trv_idx = 3 THEN b.trv_img END) AS trv_img3 FROM travel a LEFT JOIN images b ON a.trv_id = b.trv_id JOIN couple_members cm ON a.mem_id = cm.mem_id GROUP BY a.trv_id, a.mem_id, a.trv_Tt, a.trv_Pc, a.trv_Sdt, a.trv_Edt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(a.trv_Ct, 4000, 1), a.trv_Op ORDER BY a.trv_sdt DESC) WHERE #{keyWord} IS NULL OR trv_tt LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR trv_pc LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%'
